name: import-feature-test
description: Test script for import feature functionality

scripts.test:setup: node -e "console.log('Setting up test environment...'); console.log('Please configure test-config.js with your Supabase credentials');"
scripts.test:config: node -e "console.log('Current configuration:'); console.log('- Check test-config.js for settings'); console.log('- Update SUPABASE_CONFIG.anonKey'); console.log('- Update TEST_EVENT_CONFIG.eventId');"
scripts.test:help: node -e "console.log('Available test commands:'); console.log('npm run test:all - Run all tests'); console.log('npm run test:quick - Run quick test'); console.log('npm run test:duplicate - Test duplicate checking'); console.log('npm run test:batch - Test batch processing'); console.log('npm run test:error - Test error handling');"
scripts.setup:test: npm run install:test && npm run test:setup

author: Your Name
